chinese: ad）.含糊的，模糊的
他没有理解女孩含糊的话语。
english: He didn't understand her vague words

chinese: adj. 暂时的n，中间时期，过渡时期
在我们的新家准备好之前，政府为我们提供了临时住所。
english: The government provided us with interim housing until our new houses are ready

chinese: n. 名人；名流 adi，有名望的
名人受到了摄影师和粉丝的关注。
english: The celebrity got the attention of photographers and fans

chinese: n.果冻，肉冻；胶状物 adj.有胶冻的四. 成胶状；使成胶冻
尝尝我自制的橙子果冻吧。
english: Have a taste of my homemade orange jelly

chinese: adi大量的
这家服装店对店内所有的商品进行大幅度打折以促进销售。
english: The clothing store offered substantial discounts on all items to boost sales

chinese: n. 长寿，长命
他们长寿的关键在于互相关爱。
english: The key to their longevity is loving and caring for one another

chinese: adj.现任的；负有职责的
现任国王正将王冠传给他的继任者。
english: The incumbent king is passing the crown to his successor

chinese: ad.模糊的：不确定的
他应该通过哪扇门？答案是不确定的。
english: Which door should he go through, The answer is indefinite

chinese: ad）预期的，到期的；拖欠的；适当的，充分的 n.应有的权利，应得到的东西
她的宝宝预计于2月28日出生。
english: Her baby is due on February 28th

chinese: n.策略，计谋
我喜欢需要深思熟虑的策略性游戏，比如国际象棋。
english: I like strategy games that require deep thinking, like chess

chinese: 单脚跳，跳过 n.单脚跳跃；蛇麻草
这种游戏需要你单脚跳到画在地面上的不同的区域。
english: This is a game where you hop to different spots drawn on the ground

chinese: vt.暗中破坏；逐渐削弱：侵蚀•••的基础
网络罪犯破坏互联网的安全。
v.解开…•的皮带，解除…•的束缚，释放
关门放狗！
english: Close the gate and unleash the dog

chinese: ad）.自动的；无意识的 n.自动手枪
当有人走过来时，自动门会自行打开。
english: The automatic door opens by itself, when someone walks towards it

chinese: adj，有疑问的
由于贫穷和疾病这些因素，非洲国家存在很多
english: Societies in Africa are highly problematic due to factors like poverty and disease

chinese: n.违反
疲劳驾驶违反了法律，需处以罚款。
english: Driving while tired is an infringement of the law and is punishable by fine
